thread.title: Kenneth Horwitz
thread.title_full: Backcountry Gear reviewed by Kenneth Horwitz

author: Kenneth Horwitz
title: Kenneth Horwitz
text: I bought a pair of msr women's lightning ascent snowshoes for my girlfriend. I already had the men's version and I love them. The newer model can now have tails added for when carrying a pack, or really light powder. Backcountry gear got them to me fast and hassle-free.
